metadata.title: Nevertheless She Persisted Rosie The Riveter Resist Protest T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

Nevertheless she persisted American political theme featuring Rosie the Riveter in this red, yellow, white and blue design. Powerful political protest theme to inspire change and resist the current state of politics.
Inspiring message for progressive democrats and republicans to bring hope as we protest and march for our freedom, our rights, and our democracy.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
